short_description_localized.en: Private One Bedroom, King bed and sleeper sofa with two bathrooms, kitchenette, free WiFi. 526 - 673 sq. ft.

description_localized.en: Private One Bedroom, King bed and sleeper sofa with two bathrooms, kitchenette, free WiFi. 526 - 673 sq. ft.

images.name: One-Bedroom-Suite-One-Bedroom-Suite-Living-Room---View-from-Kitchenette
images.caption: One Bedroom Suite Living Room - View from Kitchenette
images.description: This living room includes a TV, dresser, sleeper sofa, arm chair, dining table with a chair, window, and coffee table,.
images.alt: On the left wall, a sleeper sofa sits opposite a suspended TV above a dresser. Between the two, a coffee table. On the back wall is a large window with a chair sitting in front of it. Opposite the window is a dining table with one chair seated at it.

images.name: One-Bedroom-Suite-One-Bedroom-Suite-Bedroom---Partial-View
images.caption: One Bedroom Suite Bedroom - Partial View
images.description: This bedroom includes a king sized bed, armless chair, 2 end tables with lamps, and a large window.
images.alt: The king sized bed sits between 2 end tables with lamps atop them. To the right of the bed is a large window with an armless chair sitting in front of it. `

images.name: One-Bedroom-Suite-One-Bedroom-Suite-Kitchenette---Partial-View
images.caption: One Bedroom Suite Kitchenette - Partial View
images.description: This kitchenette includes a glass table with 4 chairs, refrigerator, microwave, sink, and dishwasher.
images.alt: On the right wall, the microwave is built into the cabinet above the refrigerator. To the left more cabinets hang above a dishwasher. In the middle of the room, a dining table sits surrounded by 3 armless chairs. On the left wall, a large window. Above the table, a light fixture hangs from the ceiling.
